verses.verse: נָֽקְטָ֥ה <S%H5354><s%> is weary נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> My soul בְּחַ֫יָּ֥י <S%H2416><s%> of my life אֶֽעֶזְבָ֣ה <S%H5800><s%> I will leave עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> unto שִׂיחִ֑י <S%H7879><s%> my complaint אֲ֝דַבְּרָה֗ <S%H1696><s%> upon myself I will speak בְּמַ֣ר <S%H4751><s%> in the bitterness נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> of my soul

אֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> I will say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱ֭לוֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> unto God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּרְשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <S%H7561><s%> Do not condemn הֽ֝וֹדִיעֵ֗נִי <S%H3045><s%> me shew עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long תְּרִיבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7378><s%> me wherefore thou contendest

הֲט֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> right לְךָ֨ ׀ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> indeed תַעֲשֹׁ֗ק <S%H6231><s%> unto thee that thou shouldest oppress כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> indeed תִ֭מְאַס <S%H3988><s%> that thou shouldest despise יְגִ֣יעַ <S%H3018><s%> the work כַּפֶּ֑יךָ <S%H3709><s%> of thine hands וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עֲצַ֖ת <S%H6098><s%> upon the counsel רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> wicked הוֹפָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H3313><s%> and shine
הַעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> Hast thou eyes בָשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> body לָ֑ךְ אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo כִּרְא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> seeth אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> thou as man תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> see

הֲכִימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> [Are] thy days אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> of a mortal יָמֶ֑יךָ <S%H3117><s%> as the days אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or שְׁ֝נוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H8141><s%> your years כִּ֣ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> days גָֽבֶר׃ <S%H1397><s%> as man's
כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> That thou enquirest לַעֲוֹנִ֑י <S%H5771><s%> after mine iniquity וּ֭לְחַטָּאתִ֥י <S%H2403><s%> sin תִדְרֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H1875><s%> and searchest

עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> According דַּ֭עְתְּךָ <S%H1847><s%> Thou knowest כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> I am indeed לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶרְשָׁ֑ע <S%H7561><s%> that I am not wicked וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> there מִיָּדְךָ֣ <S%H3027><s%> out of thine hand מַצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> and [there is] none that can deliver

יָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H3027><s%> Thine hands עִ֭צְּבוּנִי <S%H6087><s%> have made וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֑וּנִי <S%H6213><s%> me and fashioned יַ֥חַד <S%H3162><s%> me together סָ֝בִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וַֽתְּבַלְּעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H1104><s%> yet thou dost destroy

זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> Remember נָ֭א <S%H4994><s%> now כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> as כַחֹ֣מֶר <S%H2563><s%> me as the clay עֲשִׂיתָ֑נִי <S%H6213><s%> I beseech thee that thou hast made וְֽאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> me into dust תְּשִׁיבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7725><s%> again
הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> like כֶ֭חָלָב <S%H2461><s%> as milk תַּתִּיכֵ֑נִי <S%H5413><s%> Hast thou not poured me out וְ֝כַגְּבִנָּ֗ה <S%H1385><s%> cheese תַּקְפִּיאֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7087><s%> and curdled

ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> me with skin וּ֭בָשָׂר <S%H1320><s%> and flesh תַּלְבִּישֵׁ֑נִי <S%H3847><s%> Thou hast clothed וּֽבַעֲצָמ֥וֹת <S%H6106><s%> me with bones וְ֝גִידִ֗ים <S%H1517><s%> and sinews תְּסֹכְכֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5526><s%> and knit

חַיִּ֣ים <S%H2416><s%> me life וָ֭חֶסֶד <S%H2617><s%> and favour עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> Thou hast granted עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> against וּ֝פְקֻדָּתְךָ֗ <S%H6486><s%> and thy visitation שָֽׁמְרָ֥ה <S%H8104><s%> hath preserved רוּחִֽי׃ <S%H7307><s%> my spirit

וְ֭אֵלֶּה <S%H428><s%> these צָפַ֣נְתָּ <S%H6845><s%> And these [things] hast thou hid בִלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> in thine heart יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> is within

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If חָטָ֥אתִי <S%H2398><s%> If I sin וּשְׁמַרְתָּ֑נִי <S%H8104><s%> then thou markest וּ֝מֵעֲוֹנִ֗י <S%H5771><s%> me from mine iniquity לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תְנַקֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H5352><s%> me and thou wilt not acquit

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If רָשַׁ֡עְתִּי <S%H7561><s%> If I be wicked אַלְלַ֬י <S%H480><s%> woe לִ֗י וְ֭צָדַקְתִּי <S%H6663><s%> unto me and [if] I be righteous לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> [yet] will I not lift up רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> my head שְׂבַ֥ע <S%H7646><s%> have enough קָ֝ל֗וֹן <S%H7036><s%> of confusion וּרְאֵ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> advise self עָנְיִֽי׃ <S%H6040><s%> thou mine affliction

וְ֭יִגְאֶה <S%H1342><s%> For it increaseth כַּשַּׁ֣חַל <S%H7826><s%> me as a fierce lion תְּצוּדֵ֑נִי <S%H6679><s%> Thou huntest וְ֝תָשֹׁ֗ב <S%H7725><s%> and again תִּתְפַּלָּא־ <S%H6381><s%> thou shewest thyself marvellous בִֽי׃

תְּחַדֵּ֬שׁ <S%H2318><s%> Thou renewest עֵדֶ֨יךָ ׀ <S%H5707><s%> thy witnesses נֶגְדִּ֗י <S%H5048><s%> against וְתֶ֣רֶב <S%H7235><s%> against me and increasest כַּֽ֭עַשְׂךָ <S%H3708><s%> thine indignation עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> upon me חֲלִיפ֖וֹת <S%H2487><s%> changes וְצָבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> and war עִמִּֽי׃ <S%H5973><s%> toward

וְלָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why מֵ֭רֶחֶם <S%H7358><s%> matrix הֹצֵאתָ֑נִי <S%H3318><s%> Wherefore then hast thou brought me forth אֶ֝גְוַ֗ע <S%H1478><s%> die וְעַ֣יִן <S%H5869><s%> and no eye לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no תִרְאֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7200><s%> had seen

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have been אֶהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> been מִ֝בֶּ֗טֶן <S%H990><s%> from the womb לַקֶּ֥בֶר <S%H6913><s%> to the grave אוּבָֽל׃ <S%H2986><s%> I should have been as though I had not been I should have been carried

הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> a little יָמַ֣י <S%H3117><s%> [Are] not my days [יֶחְדָּל כ] (וַחֲדָ֑ל <S%H2308><s%> cease ק) [יָשִׁית כ] (וְשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> apply ק) מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at וְאַבְלִ֥יגָה <S%H1082><s%> that I may take comfort מְּעָֽט׃ <S%H4592><s%> A little

בְּטֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before אֵ֭לֵךְ <S%H1980><s%> go וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not אָשׁ֑וּב <S%H7725><s%> [whence] I shall not return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [even] to the land חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> of darkness וְצַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <S%H6757><s%> and the shadow of death

אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> A land עֵיפָ֨תָה ׀ <S%H5890><s%> of darkness כְּמ֥וֹ <S%H3644><s%> as אֹ֗פֶל <S%H652><s%> as darkness צַ֭לְמָוֶת <S%H6757><s%> [itself and] of the shadow of death וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without סְדָרִ֗ים <S%H5468><s%> without any order וַתֹּ֥פַע <S%H3313><s%> and [where] the light כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> according to אֹֽפֶל׃ <S%H652><s%> [is] as darkness פ
